MonoBehaviour Awake.description: Awake is called when the script instance is being loaded.
body: /// Awake is called when the script instance is being loaded.

MonoBehaviour FixedUpdate.description: This function is called every fixed framerate frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.
body: /// This function is called every fixed framerate frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.

MonoBehaviour LateUpdate.description: LateUpdate is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled. It is called after all Update functions have been called.
body: /// LateUpdate is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

MonoBehaviour OnMouseOver.description: Called every frame while the mouse is over the GUIElement or Collider.
body: /// Called every frame while the mouse is over the GUIElement or Collider.

MonoBehaviour OnMouseUp.description: OnMouseUp is called when the user has released the mouse button.
body: /// OnMouseUp is called when the user has released the mouse button.

MonoBehaviour OnPostRender.description: OnPostRender is called after a camera finishes rendering the scene.
